name: bind9
description: BIND 9 has evolved to be a very flexible, full-featured DNS system.

dependencies.name: libuv
dependencies.description: Multi-platform library with a focus on asynchronous IO

dependencies.name: pkgconfig
dependencies.description:
pkg-config is a helper tool used when compiling applications and
libraries

dependencies.name: openssl
dependencies.description:
OpenSSL is an open source project that provides a robust, commercial-
grade, and full-featured toolkit for the Transport Layer Security (TLS)
and Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) protocols. It is also a general-purpose
cryptography library.

dependencies.name: libiconv
dependencies.description:
GNU libiconv provides an implementation of the iconv() function and the
iconv program for character set conversion.

dependent_to.name: isc-dhcp
dependent_to.description:
ISC DHCP offers a complete open source solution for implementing DHCP
servers, relay agents, and clients. ISC DHCP supports both IPv4 and
IPv6, and is suitable for use in high-volume and high-reliability
applications.
